casebody.data:
MYERS
v.
McGRADY and McGRADY
v.
FORREST. No. 391A04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2006. Robert T. Hargett, Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Laura J. Gendy, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Div. of Forrest Res., et al. Donald B. Strickland, Goldsboro, Jerome P. Trehy, Jr., Raleigh, Dirk J. Derrick, Conway, SC, for Gail M. Myers. Steven M. Sartorio, Raleigh, Jamal A. Rhinehart, for Shirley McGrady & Thomas Higgins. Rodney E. Petty, for Michael P. Murphy. F. Fincher Jarrell, Charlotte, for James Foust & William Spencer. Douglas F. Debank, for Verian Ladson. Charles L. Becton, Raleigh, for Interested Party.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of January 2006 by Third-Party Defendant (N.C. Division of Forest Services) for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of January 2006."
